divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were driving to McDonalds, they were big and bright it was hard not to see them , its like they slapped me in the face, My husband said they were planets, i told him they were not planets because planets would move with the moon, and they didnt move when we drove and they were on my left side, i was driving, they further we drove down the road they were behind us so i knew then they were not stars or anything like that, and then when i got to the end of the road, they crossed the road and disappeared, i was terrified and when we seen them i slowed down to get a good look and people were outside their houses looking as well. they were big orangish yellowish red light like orb things, and they made a zig zag pattern they were huge , they kind of looked like street lights in the sky, this is my first time ever seeing ufo like this, i have seen some that werent this color and seen some that flew over my house back n forth and flashed blue red and white lights and they also split into 3 parts, thought it was a plane at first until it split. i look outside all the time for ufo now that i have a camera i hope to catch some photos, i have tried before but its like it would hide behind the tree line where i could not see.!!!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Brookhaven
There were no other sightings in Brookhaven on or around January 27th 2011
